example:
() => (
  <ButtonMobileStore
    alt="Get it on Google Play"
    href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.skypicker.main"
    type="googlePlay"
  />
)

info.title: Accessibility
info.description: To set your own alternative text for the mobile store image (and so the action text for the button, use the <code>alt</alt> prop.
